Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 35 points, 15 rebounds, and 12 assists in the Nuggets' 124-105 win over the Nets.
Pre-Game Insights: Nikola Jokic expressed positive sentiments about Jordi Fernandez, noting his good job as a coach and the players' hard work under his guidance.
Post-Match Reflections: Nikola Jokic mentioned that Jordi Fernandez's daughter turned 7 on the day of the game.
Jordi Fernandez reflected on his time with the Nuggets and how it prepared him for his current role as head coach of the Brooklyn Nets.
Michael Malone commented on Fernandez's hunger for learning and his ability to relate to players, emphasizing the importance of establishing a culture.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jordi Fernandez returned to Denver as a head coach for the first time, leading an injury-depleted Nets squad.
The Nets are in rebuild mode and have traded several key players, including Dennis Schroder, Dorian Finney-Smith, and Shake Milton.
